prime_contractor_id.description: ID of organization acting as prime (can be own org or partner)

contract_value.description: Estimated or actual contract value in USD

contract_value_type.description: Type of contract value (estimated potential, ceiling, exact award, or target)

current_phase.description: Current phase in the proposal builder

custom_workflow_stage_id.description: ID of a custom Kanban column this proposal is currently in, if applicable

teaming_partner_ids.description: Array of teaming partner IDs involved

evaluation_results.description: JSON string containing strategic evaluation results

evaluation_date.description: When the evaluation was last run

ai_confidence_score.description: JSON string containing comprehensive AI confidence scoring analysis

ai_score_date.description: When the AI confidence score was last calculated

strategy_config.description: JSON string of strategy configuration from Phase 5

shared_with_client_ids.description: Array of Client entity IDs who can view this proposal in the client portal

client_view_enabled.description: Whether client portal access is enabled for this proposal

client_view_token.description: Secure unique token for generating client portal access URL

client_view_token_expires.description: When the client view token expires

client_last_viewed.description: Last time client viewed this proposal

client_feedback_count.description: Number of feedback comments from client

client_decision_date.description: When client accepted or rejected the proposal

client_decision_notes.description: Client's notes when accepting or rejecting
